My, my. What a beautiful day for a festival.$4#$e#Will you be participating in the egg hunt, @?$3
Gatherings such as this gives me a great opportunity to talk to Caroline and Jodi.$4
I think Caroline might have had too much wine.$2#$e#Go on and play, sweetie!$4
The sky is clear tonight. A flawless night of light from the moonlight jellies, wouldn't you say @?$4
That man on the bench is littering everywhere and reeks of alcohol.$2#$e#He's probably some homeless bum from Zuzu City.$5
I heard someone screaming from the maze. What could possibly be in there!?$2
You're fishing against Willy, @?$3#$e#Best of luck, sweetie.$4
Merry Winter Star, dear!$4#$e#Isn't it wonderful how happy everyone is on a beautiful day like this?$4

Entries.4000001/f Olivia 500/k 2000003/w sunny/p: jaunty/-500 -500/farmer -300 -300 0 Victor 20 38 1 Olivia 22 38 3/pause 400/skippable/viewport 20 37 true/pause 1000/speak Olivia "Honey, I just don't understand why this process is taking this long.$2"/pause 900/speak Victor "I'm trying, mother. There aren't many jobs this far away from the city.$2"/pause 800/speak Olivia "Do you think you'll move back to Zuzu City?$0"/pause 250/speak Victor "No. I have no intention of moving back there. I want to stay here in Stardew Valley.$6"/speak Olivia "Well. You better start applying yourself more to finding a job in the valley then, Victor.$5"/pause 250/shake Victor 600/pause 1000/warp farmer 20 42/playSound doorClose/pause 200/move Victor 0 0 2/pause 250/move Olivia 0 0 2/emote farmer 8/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 500/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 350/move Olivia 0 0 3/speak Victor "I'm stepping outside to get some air.$2"/pause 300/move Victor 0 1 2/pause 300/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 250/move farmer -1 0 1/pause 300/move Victor 0 3 2/pause 150/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 150/warp Victor -500 -500/playSound doorClose/stopMusic/pause 850/emote Olivia 28/pause 300/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 300/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 300/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Olivia "My apologies you walked into that, @.$2"/pause 1000/speak Olivia "Victor gets... defensive whenever I bring up employment and his career.$2#$b#He's a very bright person. He did so well in school. I don't know why he hasn't found a job yet.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 800/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 700/shake Olivia 800/pause 1250/speak Olivia "I feel as if he may have gotten too comfortable living at home. I worry for his future, @.$2"/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 650/speak Olivia "I have tasks I must attend to. You may stay if you wish, dear.$2"/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Olivia 25/end dialogue Olivia "I hope Victor figures out what he's doing soon... I understand he needs space. This is a rough period of his life.$2"

Entries.4000002/f Olivia 1000/f Jodi 250/f Carol: springtown/-500 -500/farmer 29 89 0 Olivia 24 72 3 Jodi 22 72 1 Caroline 23 71 2 Penny 7 65 2 Lewis 31 67 1 Pierre 33 67 3 Marlon 33 103 2 Wizard 33 105 0 Gus 42 72 2 Abigail 47 88 0 Haley 16 90 3 Emily 14 90 1 Linus 104 104 2 Clint 97 77 0 Victor 40 16 0/pause 400/showFrame Penny 18/skippable/viewport 23 72 true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -16 3 true/speak Jodi "That's a funny story, Olivia. I've had similar experiences with Vincent. I'm happy you treasured those moments with Victor!$1"/speak Caroline "Abigail used to do that too.$0"/speak Olivia "Being mothers, we all understand!$1"/emote Jodi 8/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 350/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 750/emote farmer 32/speak Caroline "Hi, @!$0"/pause 400/speak Jodi "It's nice to see you, @. Beautiful day today.$0"/speak Olivia "Hello, dear! It's wonderful to see you!$4"/emote farmer 20/textAboveHead Pierre "Ah, yes! That is what I mean, Lewis."/pause 200/move farmer -6 0 0 true/pause 2400/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 300/move Caroline 0 0 2/pause 1250/speak Caroline "@, I heard about %farm Farm on the radio a couple days ago. You're making so much progress!$0"/speak Jodi "Oh, yes! You are, @. It's as if our little community is expanding thanks to you.$1"/emote farmer 32/textAboveHead Penny "I love this book..."/pause 300/speak Olivia "I believe wine crafting is the most profitable in this region. I heard rumors about how much profit Sophia makes per quarter.$4"/speak Caroline "How much is it!?"/speak Jodi "!!!$0"/pause 200/textAboveHead Lewis "I'm happy to hear that, Pierre."/pause 750/speak Olivia "It's in the six figures!$1"/emote Jodi 16 true/pause 200/emote Caroline 16 true/pause 100/emote farmer 16 true/pause 750/speak Olivia "@. Have you considered turning %farm Farm into a vineyard, similar to Blue Moon Vineyard?$4"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 600/question fork0 "(What should I say?)#I'm already making wine, Olivia! You can ask Mayor Lewis to send you some crates of it when he picks up my shipments.#Wine production isn't the path I want to go down. I'm going to focus on other crops and animal products. Sophia already does a great job making wine!#I haven't gotten to the point where I can make large amounts of wine yet. There are still many things I need to get done. Crafting kegs is difficult."/fork 4000002_MakesWine/pause 500/speak Olivia "I understand. Take your time, dear. If you ever do make that first batch, let me know!$3"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/emote Olivia 32/pause 500/speak Caroline "Pierre loves getting shipments of your crops from Mayor Lewis, @!$0#$b#He says they rival the quality of his own produce.$0"/speak Jodi "I wish Susan sold her crops locally. Emerald Farm produce is sold to other towns and cities.$4#$b#She once let me purchase a melon from her. It was so delicious!$1"/pause 600/textAboveHead Pierre "You're a great friend, Lewis!"/pause 600/speak Olivia "I'm just relieved Pierre never sells Andy's crops in his store. I believe his crops are shipped to low income villages.$6"/pause 200/emote farmer 16 true/pause 300/emote Jodi 16/speak Caroline "This is true, Olivia. My husband and Andy had an argument recently.$2#$b#Pierre would only allow Andy's produce in the store if they were specifically labeled as: 'Grown at Fairhaven Farm'. Andy didn't like that...$2"/pause 400/speak Jodi "...$2"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 700/speak Olivia "Well, this conversation certainly turned sour.$2"/pause 1650/speak Olivia "@, we're going to resume our other 'motherly' conversation.$4"/pause 250/speak Caroline "It was nice seeing you, @!$0"/speak Jodi "Bye, @.$0"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 300/move farmer 8 0 1 true/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Olivia 25/end position 35 63

Entries.4000004/f Olivia 2000/w sunny: none/-500 -500/farmer -300 -300 2 Olivia 10 6 2/animate Olivia false true 150 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 22 21 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 21 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 22 21 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20/pause 100/skippable/playMusic gusviolin/pause 300/viewport 9 8 true/pause 12000/warp farmer 13 5/playSound stairsdown/pause 400/move farmer 0 1 3/pause 750/stopAnimation Olivia/showFrame Olivia 0/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 500/emote Olivia 16/pause 500/move Olivia 1 0 0/pause 400/playSound openBox/stopMusic/shake Olivia 500/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 300/speak Olivia "Hello, sweetie. I was listening to Haruhi Kiyoko. She's a famous violinist from the Gotoro Empire.$4"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 0/pause 1500/speak Olivia "I... miss listening to her live on the radio. This was a recording.$2"/pause 400/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Olivia "When the war started, all radio broadcasts were halted from the country. I'm not sure what happened to her. Wherever she is, I hope she is safe.$2"/pause 800/question fork0 "(What should I say?)#I'm positive Haruhi will be fine. After this war is over, you'll be able to listen to her beautiful violin live on the radio again.#Given how things are going over there, I can't in good conscious say that she's doing well. It's the grim truth we must accept."/fork 4000004_ListenViolin/pause 750/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 1000/shake Olivia 750/pause 1250/speak Olivia "A part of me believes that. I... I don't think she's okay. She's hurting. She has lost loved ones.$2"/pause 1100/speak Olivia "She'll never be the same after all this.$2"/pause 1000/switchEvent 4000004_Immigrants
Entries.4000004_ListenViolin: pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 1500/speak Olivia "... I'm hopeful she'll be okay.$2"/friendship Olivia 50/pause 1000/switchEvent 4000004_Immigrants
Entries.4000004_Immigrants: pause 200/speak Olivia "You know, my side of the family is from the Gotoro Empire. My mother and father came to the Ferngill Republic as immigrants.$2"/pause 400/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Olivia "I still have family and friends in the country, trapped, unable to leave. I worry for their safety.$2#$b#I... I don't know if they're okay or not. It's impossible to call or write to any of them.$2"/pause 600/emote farmer 60/pause 700/move Olivia 0 0 0/pause 600/shake Olivia 1100/pause 300/move farmer -1 0 3 true/pause 1500/speak Olivia "I've heard rumors of what's happening. I don't want to believe any of it.$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 1200/speak Olivia "I need a glass of wine.$2"/pause 600/move Olivia -5 0 0/pause 650/playSound wateringCan/shake Olivia 750/pause 250/move farmer -4 0 3/pause 1400/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Olivia "Here's a glass vintage wine for you, @. Aged 30 years, from the Fern Islands.$3"/pause 400/emote farmer 20/pause 800/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 600/move farmer 0 0 2/showFrame farmer 90/playSound pickUpItem/pause 1200/showFrame Olivia 20/pause 1600/speak Olivia "You may know of Suki, the traveling merchant. She visits the valley during the weekends to sell her exotic goods.$0"/pause 1000/speak Olivia "It's... depressing the only way to buy any Gotoro Empire goods in the valley these days is to purchase smuggled ones.$2"/pause 700/showFrame Olivia 21/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 22/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 23/pause 1250/showFrame Olivia 22/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 21/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 20/pause 1000/speak Olivia "I procured a valuable item from her a couple weeks ago.$0#$b#She was selling a rare Gotoro Empire dish with ostentatious hand-made art. It's sitting in the kitchen cabinet upstairs.$3"/pause 800/showFrame farmer 91/pause 150/showFrame farmer 92/pause 150/showFrame farmer 93/pause 100/playSound gulp/pause 750/showFrame farmer 92/pause 150/showFrame farmer 91/pause 150/showFrame farmer 90/pause 1250/question fork1 "(What should I say?)#I know of her. She has good wares on most days. I don't have many opportunities to get to know her better. She seems like an interesting person.#I've bought a lot of goods from her. She sells rare seeds and unique furniture."/fork 4000004_Suki/pause 200/switchEvent 4000004_Suki
Entries.4000004_Suki: pause 1000/showFrame Olivia 21/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 22/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 23/pause 550/showFrame Olivia 22/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 21/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 20/pause 1400/speak Olivia "Suki's daughter just turned six years old.
